name: FxTimingAPI_v4
desc: A protocol that defines the methods provided by the host, so that a plug-in can query the timing properties of its input.

items.name: func frameDuration(UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!)
items.desc: Provides the native frame duration of the object to which the effect is applied.

items.name: func sampleDuration(UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!)
items.desc: Provides the native sample duration of the object to which the effect is applied.

items.name: func startTime(forEffect: UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!)
items.desc: Provides the start time for the effect.

items.name: func durationTime(forEffect: UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!)
items.desc: Provides the duration time for the effect.

items.name: func startTimeOfInput(toFilter: UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!)
items.desc: Provides the start time of the filter’s image input clip.

items.name: func durationTimeOfInput(toFilter: UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!)
items.desc: Provides the duration of the filter's image input clip.

items.name: func start(UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!, ofImageParameter: UInt32)
items.desc: Provides the start time of the clip the user assigned to the given image parameter for the effect.

items.name: func durationTime(UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!, ofImageParameter: UInt32)
items.desc: Provides the duration of the clip the user assigns to the given image parameter for the effect.

items.name: func inPointTimeOfTimeline(forEffect: UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!)
items.desc: The in point of the timeline on which the user applies the effect.

items.name: func outPointTimeOfTimeline(forEffect: UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!)
items.desc: The out point of the timeline on which the user applies the effect.

items.name: func timelineTime(UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!, fromInputTime: CMTime)
items.desc: Converts from input time of the filter's image input to timeline time.

items.name: func timelineTime(UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!, fromImageTime: CMTime, forParameterID: UInt32)
items.desc: Converts from image time of the given parameter to timeline time.

items.name: func inputTime(UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!, fromTimelineTime: CMTime)
items.desc: Converts from timeline time to time of the filter's image input.

items.name: func imageTime(UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTime>!, forParameterID: UInt32, fromTimelineTime: CMTime)
items.desc: Converts from timeline time of the given parameter to image time.

items.name: func fieldOrderForInput(toFilter: FxTileableEffect!) -> FxFieldOrder
items.desc: Returns the field order of the filter input.

items.name: func timelineFpsNumerator(for: FxTileableEffect!) -> Int
items.desc: The numerator of the timeline’s frame rate where the user applies the effect.

items.name: func timelineFpsDenominator(for: FxTileableEffect!) -> Int
items.desc: The denominator of the timeline’s frame rate where the user applies the effect.

items.name: var kFxDuration_Undefined: Double
items.desc: A special duration value that indicates an undefined duration.
